name: Alien Quest
description:
A top-down dungeon-crawler made in 2 days for a game jam. Kill aliens, defeat bosses and enter new rooms at the 4 sides of the screen to progress and get the highest score!

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim and shoot
  • [1,2,3,4] to upgrade different stats

Made by Eawell and NOM1989, with special thanks for art to YGHRT and S-Dwag. Backing track credit: Speck.
